title: Add June 30th Option to As Of Date Prompt on Payroll Comp Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with perms for the Payroll Comparison Report
custom_expected:
THEN June 30th will be available as an As Of prompt
AND if this option is selected the report should run based on June 30th payroll report/rosters

title: As a BOC User, I want all Employee Permission Requests to Automatically Expire At The End of The Negotiating Window
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_inquiring_org_-_approved

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=143365890

AC:
 - At the conclusion of the Permission Period on Approved Requests, the system will automatically update the status of the Request to "Expired"
 - The system will generate a clipboard notification to both the Inquiring and the Receiving Club Contacts notifying them the Permission Request has expired
 - Neither Club will be able to edit the Request once it is in Expired state
 - If there is an approved extension, there request won't expire

title: As a User, I want to be stopped from editing a Permission Request if it past the end of the Negotiating Window
As a BOC User, I want all Employee Permission Requests to Automatically Expire At The End of The Negotiating Extension Window
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_inquiring_org_-_extension_approved

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=143365890

AC:
 - At the conclusion of the Permission Extension Period on Approved (Ext) Requests, the system will automatically update the status of the Request to "Expired"
 - The system will generate a clipboard notification to both the Inquiring and the Receiving Club Contacts notifying them the Permission Request has expired
 - Neither Club will be able to edit the Request once it is in Expired state

title: As a User, I want to be stopped from editing a Permission Request if it past the end of the Negotiating Extension Window
BOC User Want to Edit all Requests in Any State
custom_steps:
AC:
 - BOC Admin Users will be able to edit Employee Permission Requests, regardless of state:
  -- Active
  -- Active (Ext)
  -- Expired
